projects.title: Go Cab Now - Frontend
projects.description:
A fully responsive web application to book your cab trips.

Built with React, SASS, JWT, React Router DOM.

Implemented some features of the UI library Mantine.

Deployed on Vercel.

projects.title: Go Cab Now - Backend
projects.description:
REST API architecture backend for Go Cab Now application.

Built with Express JS, Node JS, JWT, TypeScript, Prisma as an ORM and PostgreSQL.

Integrated with different services such as SendGrid, Cloudinary and Stripe.

Backend deployed on Render and DB deployed on FL0.

projects.title: Step-Away / Landing Page
projects.description:
Landing web page designed, coded and deployed for a client.

Built with WordPress, Elementor, WordPress custom theme, CSS and React.

The site was integrated with a third-party application to process the form.

Understand client requirements and translate them into custom web solutions.

projects.title: Alpaca
projects.description:
Web page designed, coded and deployed for a client.

Built with WordPress, Elementor, CSS and JavaScript.

Understand client requirements and translate them into custom web solutions.

projects.title: Calc UI
projects.description:
The fanciest calculator on the web.

Built with React and TypeScript and someone else's interesting pieces of code from the web.

The amazing UI was made with simple CSS precompiled with SASS and using someone else's interesting pieces of code from the web.
